Tackle.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target.

Thunder Shock.description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target.

Shadow Rush.description: A shadow move that may cause the target to flinch.

Fire Blast.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire.

Surf.description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
